text: Sphodronotus is a genus of grasshoppers in the subfamily Calliptaminae, with species found in Iran. == Species == The following species are recognised in the genus Sphodronotus: * Sphodronotus cyclopterus (Uvarov, 1933) * Sphodronotus grandis Popov, 1951 == References == Category:Acrididae genera Category:Taxa named by Boris Uvarov
title: Sphodronotus
